snippet: The highest court ruled against an American company that had challenged a ban on the controversial drilling technique known as hydraulic fracturing, known informally as fracking.
abstract: France's highest court upholds government ban on much-debated drilling technique hydraulic fracturing; rules against challenge by American company Schuepbach Energy, whose exploration permits were revoked after the French Parliament banned the practice.
lead_paragraph: The highest court ruled against an American company that had challenged a ban on the controversial drilling technique known as hydraulic fracturing, known informally as fracking.

headline.main: France Upholds Ban on Hydraulic Fracturing
headline.print_headline: French Court Upholds Ban on Hydraulic Fracturing
